https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/aRKimjbsxZJGywNPXVzELRF0TLz.jpg Rich industrialist Jacques Decret learns his wife Gloria is having an affair with a young actor. For revenge, he bombards her with anonymous letters, convincing her that her lover is the culprit while Gloria desperately seeks a way out. Back to the Wall
